Class NeonConfig.Builder

java.lang.Object
com.quietterminal.projectneon.core.NeonConfig.Builder
Enclosing class:
NeonConfig
@PublicAPI public static class NeonConfig.Builder extends Object
Builder class for creating NeonConfig instances with a fluent API.
Since:
1.0

      public NeonConfig build()
